This is a submission for project: 'R markdown and Leaflet'. I just wanted to get this website hosted in github not inclined to accomplishing anything significant.

```{r}
#install.packages("rmarkdown", type = "source")
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(leaflet))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lat=69, lng=24, popup="some random location")
my_map
```
